description.original: Folder with the capability to store and retrieve data from a folder like database
description.translation: Folder with the capability to store and retrieve data from a folder like database

dict.title:\"Select an existing column to add: title:"Select an existing column to add"
dict.setName(\"Select where to save your data: setName("Select where to save your database"
dict.desc:\"Unique ID of the column. Key used: desc:"Unique ID of the column. Key used on save (support nested using '.') and also referenced in formulas and rollups"
dict.desc:\"Convert field to inline (field::: desc:"Convert field to inline (field:: value) or leave it as frontmatter (---field: value---)"
dict.desc:\"Change content alignment of the c: desc:"Change content alignment of the column"
dict.desc:\"Change content vertical alignment: desc:"Change content vertical alignment of the column"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable to wrap content of: desc:"Enable/disable to wrap content of the column"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable alias for media li: desc:"Enable/disable alias for media links using column label"
dict.desc:\"Custom alias for media links (lea: desc:"Custom alias for media links (leave blank to use column label)"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable wrap media links w: desc:"Enable/disable wrap media links with embedding content"
dict.title:\"Select the source of database da: title:"Select the source of database data"
dict.desc:\"Select from which source you want: desc:"Select from which source you want to get the data to be displayed in the table."
dict.desc:\"Choose how compact or wide cells: desc:"Choose how compact or wide cells are."
dict.desc:\"Whether to make the first column: desc:"Whether to make the first column sticky, so that it remains visible when scrolling horizontally."
dict.desc:\"The folder structure will mirror: desc:"The folder structure will mirror the values of these columns"
dict.title:\"Group all files into folders aut: title:"Group all files into folders automatically"
dict.desc:\"By default, files are groupped in: desc:"By default, files are groupped individually, after a value is updated"
dict.desc:\"Automatically remove empty folder: desc:"Automatically remove empty folders after grouping files."
dict.title:\"Hoist files with missing attribu: title:"Hoist files with missing attributes to root folder"
dict.desc:\"By default, files with missing at: desc:"By default, files with missing attributes are hoisted to the lowest possible folder"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable remove fields when: desc:"Enable/disable remove fields when a column is deleted"
dict.desc:\"Select file to use as template fo: desc:"Select file to use as template for database columns. Click the button to apply the template."
dict.desc:\"Use all fields from all your note: desc:"Use all fields from all your notes as columns. WARNING! This will override any previous columns"
dict.desc:\"New columns will be created as in: desc:"New columns will be created as inline fields by default"
dict.desc:\"Select folder to read the availab: desc:"Select folder to read the available templates for the database"
dict.desc:\"The number of rows to show per pa: desc:"The number of rows to show per page"
dict.title:\"Select the size of the font\": title:"Select the size of the font"
dict.desc:\"Use the slider to select the size: desc:"Use the slider to select the size of the font (in pixels)"
dict.desc:\"The format of the date with Luxon: desc:"The format of the date with Luxon standard"
dict.desc:\"The format of the datetime with L: desc:"The format of the datetime with Luxon standard"
dict.desc:\"Select the destination of the for: desc:"Select the destination of the formula JS files."
dict.title:\"Select another table to relate w: title:"Select another table to relate with"
dict.desc:\"Select from the existing tables t: desc:"Select from the existing tables to relate with the current column"
dict.desc:\"Select the color of the relation\: desc:"Select the color of the relation"
dict.desc:\"Select the source of the options\: desc:"Select the source of the options"
dict.desc:\"Add new pair label-value to the l: desc:"Add new pair label-value to the list of options available for this column"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable to persist formula: desc:"Enable/disable to persist formula output on your notes (Only persisted formulas could be searchable and sortable)"
dict.desc:\"Write your column formula using t: desc:"Write your column formula using the available functions + javascript"
dict.text:\"Check our documentation for more: text:"Check our documentation for more information about how to use formulas"
dict.desc:\"Select the relation column to per: desc:"Select the relation column to perform the rollup"
dict.title:\"Select position of new inline fi: title:"Select position of new inline fields"
dict.desc:\"New inline fields will be created: desc:"New inline fields will be created in the selected position on your notes"
dict.desc:\"Default value of wrap media links: desc:"Default value of wrap media links with embedding content"
dict.desc:\"Use column label as link alias of: desc:"Use column label as link alias of your URLs"
dict.desc:\"Choose default value of media dim: desc:"Choose default value of media dimensions (heightxwidth)"
dict.desc:\"This setting defines the mandator: desc:"This setting defines the mandatory header key that must be present in the csv file"
dict.desc:\"The search bar will be shown by d: desc:"The search bar will be shown by default when you open a database"
dict.desc:\"Enable auto update listener from: desc:"Enable auto update listener from other files. WARNING: requires restart to take effect."
dict.title:\"Enable developer settings. Logge: title:"Enable developer settings. Logger will be enabled"
dict.desc:\"This will log all the errors and: desc:"This will log all the errors and warnings in the console"
dict.desc:\"This will show/hide properties of: desc:"This will show/hide properties of the table on the bottom of the view"
dict.If enabled, the relation will be bidirec: If enabled, the relation will be bidirectional. If disabled, the relation will be unidirectional.
dict.desc:\"Select the action to perform on t: desc:"Select the action to perform on the rollup"
dict.desc:\"Select the property to rollup fro: desc:"Select the property to rollup from the relation"
dict.desc:\"Enable/disable to persist rollup: desc:"Enable/disable to persist rollup output on your notes (Only persisted rollups could be searchable and sortable)"
